title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Restaurants
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Restaurants              Restaurants        Kelly Taylor, Creative Commons 2.0      There are several locations around Lake Mead NRA to find food and snacks.        Boulder Basin    Food service is available at Las Vegas Boat Harbor, Lake Mead Marina which is now a part of Las Vegas Boat Harbor and Callville Bay Resort. Facilities include snack bars, restaurants and some lounges. Most provide beautiful panoramas of the lake or views of the boat harbor        East Lake Mead   A restaurant is available at Temple Bar Marina. There are no food facilities at South Cove or Pearce Ferry.        Lake Mohave    Food service is available at Lake Mohave Resort at Katherine Landing and Cottonwood Cove Resort. Facilities include snack bars, restaurants and some lounges. Most provide beautiful panoramas of the lake or views of the boat harbor.
